    • Method Detail

      • getMaxArcCost

        int getMaxArcCost()
        Returns:
        the maximal cost of an arc of this

      • getMinArcCost

        int getMinArcCost()
        Returns:
        the minimal cost of an arc of this

      • getNbVertices

        int getNbVertices()
        Returns:
        the number of vertices of this

      • getCost

        int[][] getCost()
        Returns:
        the cost matrix of this: for all vertices i and j, if (i,j) is an arc of this, then cost[i][j] = cost of (i,j), otherwise cost[i][j] = this.getMaxArcCost()+1

      • getSucc

        int[] getSucc(int i)
              throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Parameters:
        i - a vertex such that 0 <= i < this.getNbVertices()
        Returns:
        an array containing all successor vertices of i in this
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If i<0 or i>=this.getNbVertices()

      • getNbSucc

        int getNbSucc(int i)
              throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Parameters:
        i - a vertex such that 0 <= i < this.getNbVertices()
        Returns:
        the number of successor vertices of i in this
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If i<0 or i>=this.getNbVertices()
